message: I propose dividing the $10000 into $6000 for me and $4000 for you. This way, we can both agree on a fair share before the value decreases with inflation.
I think 7k is a good starting point, but I'm willing to negotiate. Your turn!
Considering the inflation impact, I propose an equal division of the $10000 into $5000 for each of us. This maintains fairness while accounting for the decreasing value of money.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a slightly smaller share, but I think 5.5k is a fair starting point. Your turn again!
